```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
pal <- colorFactor(
  palette = c("#823549", "#1D1F38"),
  domain = map_html_geo$occurred
)

leaflet(options = leafletOptions(noWrap = TRUE)) |>
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldGrayCanvas") |>
  setMaxBounds(
    lng1 = -90,
    lat1 = -180,
    lng2 = 90,
    lat2 = 180
  ) |> 
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = map_html_geo,
    color = ~pal(occurred),
    label = paste(
      "Venue: ",
      map_html_geo$venue,
      "<br>",
      "City: ",
      map_html_geo$city,
      "<br>",
      "Number of Shows: ",
      map_html_geo$number_shows
    ) |>
      lapply(htmltools::HTML)
  ) |> 
  addLegend("bottomright", pal = pal, values = map_html_geo$occurred,
    title = "Event Status",
    opacity = 1
  )
```
